books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of the Jazz Age in the United States in the 1920s, focusing on the mysterious Jay Gatsby.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South, seen through the eyes of Scout Finch, a young girl.

books.title: A Brief History of Time
books.author: Stephen Hawking
books.description: A landmark book on the nature of time and space, written by physicist Stephen Hawking.

books.title: The Selfish Gene
books.author: Richard Dawkins
books.description: A popular science book that presents an evolutionary perspective on natural selection.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction novel about Arthur Dent's journey through the galaxy after Earth is destroyed.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: An exploration of the history of humankind from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present.

books.title: Educated: A Memoir
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir of a woman who grows up in a strict and isolated family in rural Idaho and eventually escapes to pursue an education.
